definition: used of fabrics that do not require ironing, dry by hanging up wet
details:
adjective
- used of fabrics that do not require ironing
= example: used of fabrics that do not require ironing
= synonyms: permanent-press
- treated so as to be easily or quickly washed and dried and requiring little or no ironing
= synonyms: wash-and-wear
verb
- dry by hanging up wet
